title: Rough the Type - new from Tour De Force FF
content:
One more font in this month from Tour De Force FF:  
**Rough the Type** font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typophile_RTT_Promo_1_6122.png)

Only in one weight, SmallCaps, basic Latin/English leters.  
Cyrilic glypsh are still in development.  
Price: $15 at MyFonts

More at:  
 [Rough the Type @ MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184850/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/tdf/rough-the-type/).  
 [Rough the Type @ Type.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184850/http:/www.type.co.uk/a_to_z_listing/supplier/65)  
 [Rough the Type @ Luth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184850/http:/www.luth.no/default.asp?side=fonter&Searchstring=Tour+De+Force)

Dusan Jelesijevic
author: tourdeforce
